## tenantIdMatchesHomeTenant() function

Returns true if tenantId matches the utid portion of homeAccountId

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function tenantIdMatchesHomeTenant(tenantId?: string, homeAccountId?: string): boolean;
```
